lines.text: Maybe they had... some sort of gray, dusty powder that they needed to hide.
Maybe they converted their hay into ash so they could hide the stuff they needed to set up that tub!
If they mixed it into the ash, we'd never know! And the paper bag it came in would burn up, too!
...Huh. That theory actually ain't half bad.
Thing is, I don't see how it pertains to Slick Emmup's death.
Ugh... yeah, that's still a mystery.
My guess is there's another reason they started the fire, and hidin' the mix was just convenient.
